Compute the rejection probability of unadjusted score test.

rejection_computation.Rd

Compute the rejection probability of unadjusted score test.

Usage

rejection_computation(mean_list, sd_list, side, cutoff)

Arguments

mean_list

Numeric vector. Mean values of test statistics for each hypothesis.

sd_list

Numeric vector. Standard deviation values of test statistics for each hypothesis.

side

Character. Test sidedness: "left", "right", or "both".

cutoff

(Optional) A numeric value between 0 and 1 to use as the p-value cutoff

Value

The rejection probablity.

On this page
